category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 2 (scope of application)
contents: Article 2 (Scope of Application) ① This regulation applies to the following advisory committees (hereinafter referred to as *Committee). Revised 2017. 4. 3., 2018. 4. 25., 2023. 7. 5. 1. School Sports Committee 2. Community Sports Committee 3. International Committee 4. Performance Improvement Committee 5. Sports Club Committee 6. Women’s Sports Committee 7. Culture Committee 8. North-South Sports Exchange Committee 9. Medical Affairs Committee 10. Marketing Committee 11. Public Relations/Media Committee 12. Employment/Ability Development Committee 13. Athlete Related Committee 14. Education Committee 15. Athlete Welfare Committee 16. Senior Sports Committee 17. Information and Statistics Committee 18. Safety Committee 19. Regional Coexistence Committee 20. ESG Management Committee 21. Ethical Management Committee 22. Other committees established by resolution of the Board of Directors pursuant to Article 44, Paragraph 1 of the Articles of Incorporation ② In addition to the committees under each subparagraph of Paragraph 1 Matters pertaining to committees operated in accordance with other regulations shall be governed by these regulations, except as specifically provided for in the Articles of Incorporation and the relevant committee regulations. Revised 2023. 7. 5.
